Travelog

Pigeon Point Lighthouse

 Saturday, February 23, 2019
Pigeon Point Lighthouse, California—

On a Feburary weekend, I visited Pigeon Point Lighthouse south of Bay area. It is an ideal place to propose. Note: it is better to visit in the morning near sunrise.

Wildflowers encountered on my way to the lighthouse, 37°24'41.1"N 122°25'22.2"W

Also tried long exposure for the first time!

Pigeon Point Lighthouse, California

Your Host: Tianwei Zhang

It is better to travel ten thousand miles than to read ten thousand books
